channel.title: Request Help please! {PAYING $$$} help me with PI source
channel.description:
Hello guys can anyone please help me with PI source , theses things i need to fix:
1- auto-vote 2- auto-save (players keep getting rollback and log out to save, i don't like that i want auto-save) 3- Combat in wildy pk (When i atk a NPC the hit is fine but when i pk the hits=damage are shits can anyone fix it) 4- Barrage far cast (when i try to freeze someone i move to the enemy i cant farcast) 5- Donator Null friends chat (When a donator PM something i cant see his name only i see ''From'' and if i tried to look who it was i get null and have to refresh the webclient) 6- zaryte bow hit fix , dharok axe look fix, black defender look fix, compilation cape stats fix
add me on skype: areyou.mad im willing to offer $$$ Paypal or rsgp please i really need help

item.title: Request Help please! {PAYING $$$} help me with PI source
item.dc:creator: @General_Z General Z
item.description:
@General_Z wrote:

Hello guys can anyone please help me with PI source , theses things i need to fix:

1- auto-vote
2- auto-save (players keep getting rollback and log out to save, i don’t like that i want auto-save)
3- Combat in wildy pk (When i atk a NPC the hit is fine but when i pk the hits=damage are shits can anyone fix it)
4- Barrage far cast (when i try to freeze someone i move to the enemy i cant farcast)
5- Donator Null friends chat (When a donator PM something i cant see his name only i see ‘‘From’’ and if i tried to look who it was i get null and have to refresh the webclient)
6- zaryte bow hit fix , dharok axe look fix, black defender look fix, compilation cape stats fix

add me on skype: areyou.mad im willing to offer $$$ Paypal or rsgp please i really need help
